title: Narrative-Based Mathematics Projects: Customized Education for Adult Learners to Improve Emotional Intelligence

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics comprehension and basic digital device manipulation
context.additional_context: Learners develop emotional intelligence and mathematical thinking simultaneously by narrating emotional experiences during problem-solving processes. Establishment of collaborative and feedback systems using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can express emotional experiences encountered during the mathematics problem-solving process as structured narratives
Learners enhance emotional intelligence by listening to peers' narratives and providing empathetic feedback.
Learners improve real-world mathematical problem-solving skills by over 30% through narrative-based PBL activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
